categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lily Tora-Asi was a human female Jedi Knight who lived during the High Republic Era. She wielded a pair of identical green-bladed lightsabers which featured circular guards.

A Knight of the Jedi Order, Lily was stationed at a remote Jedi outpost on Banchii in the Inugg system. After the events of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, she was assigned to help displaced civilians relocate to Banchii. In addition to this task and her responsibilities in training Padawans at the Jedi outpost, Lily had to confront threats from the Drengir and the Nihil.

Lily Tora-Asi is set to appear in the 2021 Japanese manga series Star Wars: The High Republic: The Edge of Balance, written by Justina Ireland and Shima Shinya, and illustrated by Mizuki Sakakibara. The character was first pictured on the cover of Star Wars: The High Republic: The Edge of Balance, Vol. 1 when it was showcased to the public during the launch livestream for Star Wars: The High Republic on January 4, 2021. She was later identified in the debut episode of Star Wars: The High Republic Show on January 27.
